verses.name: Genesis 26:27
verses.text: And Isaac said unto them, Wherefore come ye to me, seeing ye hate me, and have sent me away from you?

verses.name: Genesis 26:28
verses.text: And they said, We saw certainly that the Lord was with thee: and we said, Let there be now an oath betwixt us, even betwixt us and thee, and let us make a covenant with thee;

verses.name: Genesis 26:29
verses.text: That thou wilt do us no hurt, as we have not touched thee, and as we have done unto thee nothing but good, and have sent thee away in peace: thou art now the blessed of the Lord.
